docs.title: Main Page
docs.text:
Hi, This is Stella's website made with MkDocs, if you're here you're probably looking for the WIP wiki for mod features, you can navigate to it using the Sidebar

You are free to take and use this as you please under GNU General Public v3.0 License

docs.title: Mod Features
docs.text: This Wiki is a WIP, this is going to start with SkyHanni, and possibly add other Mods, their features, and downloads for those mods

docs.title: Skyblock Mods
docs.text:
SkyHanni - (1.8.9) - Huge skyblock mod mostly used for the garden features, and custom scoreboard, depends on NotEnoughUpdates

  • GitHub Repository - https://github.com/hannibal002/SkyHanni
  • Discord Invite - https://discord.gg/skyhanni-997079228510117908

NotEnoughUpdates - Skyblock Mod that adds unique features such as Inventory Buttons, Storage Overlay, and various Skill progress displays

  • GitHub Repository - https://github.com/NotEnoughUpdates/NotEnoughUpdates
  • Discord Invite - https://discord.gg/Moulberry

Skytils - Dungeon mods with various solvers, Crystal Hollow Map, and Dungeon Score Calculation

  • GitHub Repository - https://github.com/Skytils/SkytilsMod
  • Discord Invite - https://discord.gg/skytils

Patcher - General performance improvements for 1.8.9 Minecraft

  • Discord Invite - https://discord.gg/sk1er
  • GitHub Repository - https://github.com/Sk1erLLC/Patcher

OptiFine - Performance improvements for 1.8.9

  • Discord Invite - https://discord.gg/optifine

docs.title: SkyHanni Features
docs.text: SkyHanni is a popular SkyBlock mod, skyrocketing in popularity shortly after the Garden Update because of it's useful features, it has a lot of features for all sections of the game

docs.title: SkyMart
docs.text: Shows Copper Prices inside SkyMart by the coin to copper ratio - Higher Number is better for Profit

docs.title: Crop Milestones
docs.text: • Shows Crop Milestones in the Stack Size in the Desk Menu

docs.title: Average Milestone
docs.text:
• Shows Average Crop Milestone level, Adds all, of them together then divides by the number of them, Max Average Crop Milestone is 46
  • Unlike the other Features in this category, this does not have anything to do with stack size

docs.title: Crop Upgrades
docs.text: • Shows Crop Upgrades in the stack size of the Desk Menu

docs.title: Composter Upgrades
docs.text: • Shows Upgrades in the Stack Size of the Composter

docs.title: Custom Keybinds
docs.text:
Allows you to set different keybinds for most keys while holding a Farming Tool

  • Allows rebinding the following controls

    Attack, Use Item, Move Left, Move Right, Move Forward, Move Back, Jump, and Sneak

    • Multiple keys on the same action are not allowed
How to Configure - Go to the Start of your Farming Lane - Type /shlanedetection - Continue Farming until you pass two ends of the lane - It should now be fully configured and notify you when you finish each lane

docs.title: Lane Switch Notification
docs.text:
• Displays a Sound when you're X (customizable) seconds away from the end of the current lane
    • Supports Customizing Sound, Text, Repeat Duration (How often it repeats), and Pitch

docs.title: Distance Display
docs.text: • Displays a HUD element of how far away you are from the end of the lane

docs.title: Corner Waypointss
docs.text: • Shows the corner of the Lane as a waypoint of the current lane you're farming

docs.title: Display
docs.text: • Displays a HUD Element for your Garden Level in the format "Garden Level X (XP/XP To Level)"

docs.title: Overflow
docs.text: • Changes various Garden Level Displays to show past the SkyBlock max level in the same scaling (10,000 per level past 15)

docs.title: Overflow Chat
docs.text: • Shows Messages for the previous feature each time you pass a milestone,

docs.title: Farming Weight
docs.text: • Farming Weight is a Calculation from "Elite Farmers" More info can be found on Elitebots Website

docs.title: Display
docs.text: • Adds a Display for your current Farming Weight

docs.title: Leaderboard Ranking
docs.text: • Shows your Leaderboard placement if you are in the top 10,000 Farmers on EliteBot

docs.title: Overtake ETA
docs.text: • Shows how long until you'll pass the next player , If you're below 10,000 it will show how long until you're tracked on the leaderboard

docs.title: Show LB Change
docs.text: • Shows if you've lost positions upon entering garden while offline after entering the Garden,

docs.title: Always ETA
docs.text: • Always show Overtake ETA even when not Farming in Garden

docs.title: ETA Goal
docs.text: • Allows you to Set a custo mnumber of position you want to track

docs.title: Show below 200
docs.text: • Shows your weight even if you're below position 200, by default it does not display.

docs.title: Show Outside Garden
docs.text: • Shows the Farming Weight display /outside the Garden

docs.title: Dicer RNG Drop Tracker
docs.text: • Displays What Drops you've gotten with the Melon/Pumpkin Dicer, Like other Trackers it can be customized more from inventories, such as displaying only this Session or Total since mod install

docs.title: Compact Format
docs.text: • Changes the Display from Seperate rows for each Drops to a Colored X/X/X/X Format, taking less Vertical Space

docs.title: Hide Chat
docs.text: • Hides the messages from Dicers

docs.title: Money per Hour
docs.text: • Shows the Money per hour of various Crops

docs.title: Only Show Top
docs.text: • Customizes how many crops on the list you see

docs.title: Extend Top List
docs.text: • Adds the current crop for the tool you're holding into the list, even if it's not in the top threshold set above

docs.title: Always On
docs.text: • Displays it even if you're not farming in Garden, this does not enable it outside Garden

docs.title: Compact Mode
docs.text: • Hides the position and name of the crop (Still shows the Icon) to take up less Horizontal Space

docs.title: Compact Price
docs.text: • Compacts the price by rounding, EG 11,423,132 to 11.4M

docs.title: Use Custom
docs.text: • Allows you to set what the Money/H Defaults to (Eg: Sell Offer, NPC, Instasell)

docs.title: Merge Seeds
docs.text: • Merges the Wheat and Seed price together

docs.title: Include X
docs.text: • Various Toggles to add profit from Bountiful, Mooshroom Cow, Armor Drops, Dicer Drops

docs.title: Hide Title
docs.text: • Hides the first line of the Money/H Display to compact it even further

docs.title: Show Jacob's Contest
docs.text: • Adds a HUD Element with what the next Jacob's Contest is

docs.title: Outside Garden
docs.text: • Shows the HUD Element outside garden

docs.title: In Other GUIs
docs.text: • Shows the Jacob's Contest Display in other Farming GUIs

docs.title: Fetch Contests
docs.text: • If you haven't opened calendar, fetch the Contests from Elitebots API

docs.title: Share Contests
docs.text: • Allows you to share Contests to the Elitebots API so other people can use the previous feature without opening

docs.title: Warning
docs.text: • Displays a Warning for Upcoming Jacob's Contest

docs.title: Warning Time
docs.text: • Customize the amount of seconds before a Contest you're notified

docs.title: Popup Warning
docs.text: • Pops up with a window when the game is out of focus

docs.title: Warn For
docs.text: • Allows you to Customize which crops you want to look forward to

docs.title: Enabled
docs.text: • Tracks all drops you get from Armor

docs.title: Hide Chat
docs.text: • Hides the messages from farming armor drops

docs.title: Medal Prices
docs.text: • Shows the Price per Gold Medal in Anita's Shop (Higher is Better)

docs.title: Extra Farming Fortune
docs.text:
• Adds Price and Current tier to the Anita Farming Forunte Upgrade
  • Since the Anita Menu item disappears when it's maxed, it is not visible after that

docs.title: FF Display
docs.text: • Shows your Farming Fortune and Crop Fortune combined for the tool you're holding as a HUD Element

docs.title: Farming Fortune Guide
docs.text:
• Shows possible farming fortune, and breaks down the ways you can get it for a specific crop, or global buffs, sorted by lowest price to highest
  • Also visible by typing /ff

docs.title: Compact Descriptions
docs.text: • Compacts a lot of parts of the descriptions of tools, Shrinks T3 Hoes Description by ~20%

docs.title: Breakdown Hotkey
docs.text: • Allows to set a hotkey for a more detailed breakdown of the ways the tool gives you farming fortune

docs.title: Tooltip Format
docs.text:
• Shows Crop-Specific farming fortune in the tooltip
  • Unsure if this actually does anything since they added crop specific fortune as a stat

docs.title: Total Crop Milestone
docs.text:
• Adds a progress bar to Max Milestone in the Crop Milestone Inventory
  • Hypixel implemented this feature if you are past Milestone 20

docs.title: Enable
docs.text: • Adds a HUD Element to show yaw and pitch, fades out without mouse movement

docs.title: Precision
docs.text: • Adds Precision to the Yaw/Pitch to allow you to get the exact position for farming

docs.title: Show Without Tool
docs.text: • Does not require a tool in your hand for the HUD Element

docs.title: Show Outside Garden
docs.text: • Allows it to be shown outside Garden

docs.title: Ignore Timeout
docs.text: • Stops it from timing out after not moving your mouse

docs.title: Mode
docs.text: • Lets you switch between off, holding keybind, or holding any farming tool

docs.title: Reducing Factor
docs.text: • Divides your Sensitivity by the amount Specified

docs.title: Show GUI
docs.text: • Adds a HUD Element to show if the feature is currently working

docs.title: Only in Ground
docs.text: • If you are not on the ground disable Sensitivity Reducer to allow mouse movement to behave as Normal

docs.title: Disable in Barn
docs.text: • If you're in the barn, disable Sensitivity Reducer to allow movement to behave as normal

docs.title: Enable
docs.text: • Shows the waypoint for the start of the farming location if you're holding a farming tool

docs.title: Crop Location Mode
docs.text:
• Allows selecting where the Waypoint will Display
  • Choose between Last Farmed, and where it's set to start
  • "/shcropstartlocation" sets the starting location

docs.title: Enabled
docs.text: • Highlights Plots based on their Status set below

docs.title: Statuses
docs.text:
• Select which status to display
  • Options are "Pasting, Current Plot, Pests, Sprays, and Locked"

docs.title: Garden Plot Icon
docs.text:
• Allows you to select an item in your inventory to replace the Plot item for
  • This is why you see the axe in the Bottom Right corner of the Plot Menu
  • Also has a Reset Button

docs.title: Warp Commands
docs.text: • Adds secondary commands for hypixel commands for: "/home" for "/warp garden", "/barn" for "/plottp barn", and "/tp plot" for /plottp plot"

docs.title: Hotkeys
docs.text: • Allows you to set hotkeys for the previous warps stated that only work in garden

docs.title: Enabled
docs.text: • Adds a display to show the currently active Atomspheric Filter Display

docs.title: Only Show Buff
docs.text: • Compacts it by not showing the current season, instead only showing the buff from the season

docs.title: Abbreviate Season
docs.text: • Abbreviates the season to compact it

docs.title: Abbreviate Perk
docs.text: • Abbreviate the perk it gives to compact it

docs.title: Outside Garden
docs.text: • Enables the Feature outside the Garden

docs.title: Plot Price
docs.text: • Shows the Unlock price for plots in coins if the compost was bought from bazaar

docs.title: Fungi Cutter Warning
docs.text: • Adds a title to warn you if you're breaking the wrong mushroom with the Fungi Cutter

docs.title: Burrowing Spores
docs.text: • Displays when you drop a Burrowing Spore while farming mushrooms

docs.title: Wild Strawberry
docs.text: • Displays a notification when you drop Wild Strawberry Dye

docs.title: FF for Contest
docs.text: • Shows the Lowest farming fortune with your BPS rate that you need to get a medal

docs.title: Contest Time Needed
docs.text: • Shows how long with your current farming fortune and BPS rate you need to farm for a medal

docs.title: Custom BPS
docs.text: • Override BPS rate to the one set below

docs.title: Contest Summary
docs.text: • Summarizes various stats on how you did during the Farming Contest

docs.title: Enable Plot Borders
docs.text: • Shows Plot Borders when doing F3+G

docs.title: Copy Milestone Data
docs.text: • Allows you to copy incorrect crop milestone data

docs.title: Logbook Stats
docs.text: • Shows Stats on your Visitor Logbook

docs.title: Visitor Timer
docs.text: • Adds a HUD Element for how many visitors you currently have, and how long until the next one

docs.title: Sixth Visitor Estimate
docs.text: • Estimates when the "Sixth visitor" will be available, because the counter for the next visitor counts down even when it's full

docs.title: Sixth Visitor Warning
docs.text: • Adds a Title for when the Sixth Visitor is available

docs.title: New Visitor Ping
docs.text:
• Adds a Title for when you are less than 10 seconds away from a New Visitor
  • Useful for speedruns sucha s the Epheremal Gratitude Item

docs.title: Enable
docs.text: • Shows the items that Visitors request

docs.title: Only When Close
docs.text: • Only show the Shopping List when you are near Visitors

docs.title: Bazaar Alley
docs.text:
• Also show the Shopping List while in Bazaar Alley
  • Useful for when you don't have a Booster Cookie

docs.title: Farming Areas
docs.text:
• Shows the Shopping List while inside Farming Areas on public islands
  • Useful for Early Game players, although since you can paste items with compacted forms, it might be better to farm on garden

docs.title: Show Price
docs.text: • Shows the price for the items on the Shopping List

docs.title: Show Sack Count
docs.text: • Shows how many items you already have in your Sack

docs.title: Show Super Craft
docs.text: • Shows a button to super craft items if you have a lower tier in your sacks

docs.title: Item Preview
docs.text: • Shows the items they could possibly request before talking to the visitor

docs.title: Notify in Chat
docs.text: • Sends a chat message of a detected special drop

docs.title: Show over Name
docs.text: • Shows the special drop they're offering

docs.title: Block Refusing Reward
docs.text: • Prevents hitting the Decline Button unless you are holding the Bypass Key

docs.title: Bypass Key
docs.text: • Allows you to configure a key to press while declining/accepting the visitor to bypass the above setting

docs.title: Items
docs.text: • Allows you to select what items are prevented from being declined

docs.title: Coins Per Copper
docs.text: • With the Below options on, set a Coins Per Copper threshold

docs.title: Block Refusing Copper
docs.text: • Blocks refusing copper if it costs less than the threshold

docs.title: Block Accepting Copper
docs.text: • Blocks accepting copper if it's costs more than the threshold

docs.title: Acceptable Coin Loss
docs.text: • Allows you to set a max coin loss per visitor, settings above take precedent before this

docs.title: Block Refusing Low Loss
docs.text: • Stops you from declining a visitor with a lower loss than the threshold set above

docs.title: Block Accepting High Loss
docs.text: • Stops you from accepting a visitor with a higher loss than the theshold set above

docs.title: Block refusing New Visitors
docs.text:
• Stops you from declining visitors you haven't served before
  • Useful for the Green Thumb Enchantment

docs.title: Opacity
docs.text: • How strong of a grey the offer buttons show if they are blocked

docs.title: Outline
docs.text: • Adds a Red/Green outline around the option you should set according to the set features above

docs.title: Notification Chat
docs.text: • Show in chat when a Visitor is visiting your Garden

docs.title: Notification Title
docs.text: • Shows a Title when a Visitor is visiting your Garden

docs.title: Highlight Status
docs.text:
• Highlights or adds a Line under the name based on the Status of Visitors
  • Statuses are Waiting, New, Accepted, Declined.

docs.title: Hypixel Message
docs.text: • Hides the chat message that Hypixel sends when a new visitor arrives

docs.title: Hide Chat
docs.text:
• Hides the chat message responses from the garden
  • Does not remove Beth and Spaceman messages\

docs.title: Enabled
docs.text: • Counts the rewardss from visitors and displays them as a HUD element

docs.title: Text Formats
docs.text: • Adds or removes Elements from the Visitor Drop Statistic Counter HUD element

docs.title: Display Numbers First
docs.text: • Choose if you want to display the amount obtained before or after the drop

docs.title: Display Icons
docs.text: • Replaces the drop names with icons of the obtained item, also compacts the HUD element by taking less horizontal space

docs.title: Accept Hotkey
docs.text: • Accepts a visitor when hitting the set key

docs.title: Highlight Visitors in SkyBlock
docs.text: • Highlights NPC's that can be visitors outside of the Garden

docs.title: Block Interacting with Visitors
docs.text:
• Allows you to block clicking on certain visitors for Visitor Cycling
  • Supports only blocking on Bingo

docs.title: Progress Display
docs.text:
• Shows a HUD for the Progress and ETA to the next Crop Milestone
  • For full accuracy you need a Mathematical Hoe or the Cultivating Enchantment

docs.title: Crop Milestone Display
docs.text: • Shows Overflow levels in the Crop Milestone HUD Element

docs.title: Best Crop Time
docs.text: • Shows overflow Levels in the Best Crop Time Display (for overflow Average Crop Milestone)

docs.title: Inventory
docs.text:
• Shows overflow levels as the stack size in the Crop Milestone Menu
  • Also changes the Crop Milestone Average display to average overflow

docs.title: Tooltip
docs.text: • Shows overflow level progress in the tooltip in the Crop Milestone Menu

docs.title: Discord RPC
docs.text: • Shows overflow levels in the Discord Rich Presence feature

docs.title: Chat
docs.text: • Sends messages upon gaining an Overflow crop milestone level

docs.title: Warn When Close
docs.text: • Warns 5 seconds before when the next Crop Milestone level will happen

docs.title: Time Format
docs.text: • Changes the Highest time unit to show for the Crop Milestone Display

docs.title: Maxed Milestone
docs.text: • Calculate progress to 46 instead of the next milestone

docs.title: Milestone Text
docs.text: • Menu that allows Customizing the Crop Milestone HUD Element

docs.title: Block Broken Precision
docs.text: • Adjust the decimals and precision shown by your Blocks per second Display

docs.title: Seconds Before Reset
docs.text: • Adjusts the time before the Blocks per second reset

docs.title: Best Crop Time
docs.text: • Lists all the crops you have farming data with and sorts it by Skyblock XP or Garden XP

docs.title: Sort Type
docs.text: • Adjust between sorting between Garden and Skyblock XP

docs.title: Only Show Top
docs.text: • Shows the top amount of crops for the above setting

docs.title: Extend Top List
docs.text: • Adds the crop for the held tool to the List even if it's not in the top X

docs.title: Always On
docs.text: • Always show the Best XP Display while in the garden

docs.title: Compact Display
docs.text: • Compacts the Best Crop XP HUD display

docs.title: Hide Title
docs.text: • Hides the Title for the top Garden/Skyblock XP Display to compact it further

docs.title: Display Enabled
docs.text: • Shows a HUD element for Mushroom while using Mushroom Cow Pet

docs.title: Mushroom Text
docs.text: • Allows adjustment of the Mushroom Pet Perk HUD Element

docs.title: Show On HUD
docs.text: • Adds a HUD Element for the Optimal speed for your held tool

docs.title: Warning Title
docs.text: • Warn via title when you are not using the set speed

docs.title: Rancher Boots
docs.text: • Allows you to set the optimal speed in the Rancher Boots menu by clicking the preset

docs.title: Custom Speed
docs.text: • Drop-down menu to customize the Optimal Speed for crops

docs.title: Composter Overlay
docs.text: • Adds an overlay while in the Composter to show organic matter, fuel, profit, and

docs.title: Overlay Price
docs.text: • Select in between Instant Buy and Buy Order for the composter Overlay

docs.title: Retrieve from
docs.text: • Chooses whether to retrieve materials from Sacks or the Bazaar by default

docs.title: Composter Display
docs.text: • Displays Composter Data as a HUD Element

docs.title: Outside Garden
docs.text: • Show the time until composter is empty outside the garden

docs.title: Composter Warning
docs.text: • Warns when the composter is close to empty/is empty

docs.title: Upgrade Price
docs.text: • Shows the price to upgrade the Composter in the tooltip

docs.title: Round Amount Needed
docs.text: • Rounds the amount needed down so that you don't waste organic material/fuel due to the composter cap

docs.title: Highlight Upgrade
docs.text: • Highlights upgrades that can be Currently bought

docs.title: Inventory Numbers
docs.text: • Shows the amount of Organic Matter, Fuel, and Compost available

docs.title: Enable
docs.text: • Shows a Notification when you are going to run low on Composter supplies

docs.title: Show Title
docs.text: • Also show a title to notify the player

docs.title: Min Organic Matter
docs.text: • Adjusts the Organic Matter amount to notify on

docs.title: Min Fuel
docs.text: • Adjusts the Fuel amount to notify on
